## FrameStats.getValue() method

Retrieve the value of the performance number.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getValue(name: string): number | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of the performance number. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number \| undefined

The value of the performance number or `undefined` if it has not been declared by `setValue` before.
